long_description: Outdoor concerts, picnics, rambles through flowery meadows-you'll find countless occasions to wear the prAna Sarafina Dress. It's made of organic-cotton jersey knit with a fabulous color wash. Organic cotton is grown without the use of toxic pesticides and offers breathble comfort and easy care. Rainwash treatment creates a contrasting color at the hem. Bra-friendly twist detail is found in back. prAna Sarafina dress features a high waistband with delicate shirring.
short_description: Outdoor concerts, picnics, rambles through flowery meadows-you'll find countless occasions to wear the prAna Sarafina Dress. It's made of organic-cotton jersey knit with a fabulous color wash.
